titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Chapter of the Cathedral Church of St. Paul collection

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: Cathedral Church of St. Paul (Detroit, Mich.)

did.unittitle: Chapter of the Cathedral Church of St. Paul collection

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: The Cathedral Chapter is responsible for the physical plant of the Episcopal Cathedral Church of St. Paul, Detroit, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: In 1989 the Chapter published "Through the Years, 1834-1988," which contained histories of parishes and other organizations in the Episcopal Diocese of Michigan. This collection contains parish histories, clergy lists, photographs, and other documents collected for the book.
